name: AskMyAssistant
0:
”Alexa, ask my assistant to welcome David”
”Alexa, ask my assistant to say hello to David”
”Alexa, ask my assistant to hello Eva”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my assistant
des:
Surprise your guests!
Alexa can recognise your gender, she can compliment you and offer some ice cream.

She will greet your guests in a nice way.

We are adding more and more greetings and planning to add even more functionalities to have a proper assistant to you all beautiful people!

Hope you will enjoy it!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
